info: Answer the following questions: ( 1 X 6 = 6 Marks)

detail.question: When do the birds travel from northern regions to southern warmer lands and why?
What danger do they face when they are flying over the sea?
What is the migration speed of the birds?

inference.question: What happens to these birds at night when they see the lights?

assumption.question: When do the birds make their return journey?
